nodes.message: Corey & Lori need to decide what they'd like to put inside the chest.

nodes.text: A chest the size of this one could hold a huge amount of plunder.
I'd better take it all and find out.
Well, that wasn't one of the Seven Plunders of the World, but it was still worth plundering.
It's immense. Even if I could lift it, I wouldn't be able to do anything except drop it again.
Locked, of course.
I don't know why people don't see the value in leaving their chests unlocked!
Okay, what have we got here?
Aaand... like so!
I need more practice, that's the problem.
I'm going to need lockpicks for this.
I hope this was worth the trouble...
Ah, it's an Antidote Potion. That could come in handy around here.
There's a pouch of Sleeping Powder here.
I guess it's to let someone really rest in peace.
Shame it won't work on Undead.
There's some sort of clothing here...
It's a pair of pants made of snakeskin leather.  Pretty fancy stuff - and it looks like it's my size!
There are a few coins left in the bottom of this chest, but it's not going to make me rich.
You can tell I've been here.
It's a chest, an ordinary chest.
And I'm serious, I'm not saying that in chest!
